meta.job_title: Chemical Mechanical Planarization (CMP) Process Development Intern

duties_responsibilities.duty: Contribute to the development and improvement of CMP process and equipment in support of next-generation product technology.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop new semiconductor devices and techniques for manufacturability.
Perform thorough process characterization, develop new consumables, and evaluate new hardware for CMP solutions.
Contribute to ground-breaking research and innovation for potential patents.

education_certification.credential: MS/PhD in Chemical Engineering, Chemistry, Material Science, Electrical Engineering, or related field (graduation date should not be prior to September 2024)
